name: rich poker
description:
【Decision version of card game "Millionaire"! 】
Let's save the millionaire points and get rich items!
It is perfect for killing time to commute to school because you can interrupt / restart at any time!
Play with ease and aim at Japan's strongest richest man!

■ Rules that can be set
- Seductive shed: Forcibly flowing the field when you go up
- Revolution sinking: When the revolution arises the field flows
- The staircase revolution: revolutionized with 4 or more consecutive number cards
- Numerical staircase: Even if the soot (mark) is different, it can be put out if the numbers are continuous
- 8 cuts
- 11 back
- Space 3 return
- Joker availability
